Name: Snatch Media Toolbox
About the game: Snatch Media Toolbox contains a Radio Stream Player with Gif Visuals, Audio Player with Search, MP4 Screensaver, Screen Recorder: 60fps, WebCam Viewer, File Converter and Timer. Features Desktop Screen Recorder 60fps MKV with its own audio device, for quick start up Video and Audio Converter for MP4 to MP3, MKV to MP4 60fps, any audio to mp3 Recording Timer controls all aspects of the toolbox Audio Media Player, plays mp3, aac, flac, wav, ogg, aiff and m4a formats. Save your whole music collection and convert to playlists or use the Jukebox. Radio Stream Player with Transitional Gif images & Recorder: MP3 an M3U8 Streams. Over 40 International Radio Stations or simply import your own stations. GifPlayer plays multiple random gifs while your music or radio plays Video Loop Screensaver plays multiple video loops while your music or radio plays WebCam Viewer Snatch Media Toolbox Radio... Helping you to keep up with the very latest News and Music from your part of the world and every other.
